remarks: Double restricted existential uniqueness.  This theorem shows a condition under which a "naive" definition matches the correct one, analogous to ~ 2eu1 .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jun-2017.)
statement:
2reu1 $p |- ( A. x e. A E* y e. B ph -> ( E! x e. A E! y e. B ph <-> ( E! x e. A E. y e. B ph /\ E! y e. B E. x e. A ph ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
